RT @RepMcKinley: Proud to have signed on to support, we face many challenges from our growing infrastructure. The NEPRA permitting process‚Ä¶

As Marty Durbin, Senior VP for Policy at @USChamber, says: "Projects should not take longer to permit than they do to construct... We won't be able to meet our growing infrastructure challenges without restoring the NEPA permitting process back to its original intent."

The average length of a NEPA permitting process is 4.5 years. Local communities cannot afford to wait that long for critical infrastructure. Modernizing & streamlining NEPA will allow the U.S. to strengthen our infrastructure, create jobs, and encourage environmental leadership.

RT @westerncaucus: The ESA is a bedrock conservation law, but over time has failed to live up to its noble vision. In fact, it has only a 3‚Ä¶

Members of the @westerncaucus from across the nation are united in our message: We must #ModernizeESA. Strengthening this bedrock conservation law is good for species, communities, science, taxpayers, and our economy.

@RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson @RepAndyBiggsAZ @RepRalphNorman @replouiegohmert Our legislative package has gained the support of dozens of organizations like the National ESA Reform Coalition, @USChamber, @NAHBhome, @NRECANews, @WesternEnergy1, @NACoTweets, Family Farm Alliance, @Women4Ag, @AGCofA, @NCottonCouncil, @NationalMining, @IPAAaccess & more.

@RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson @RepAndyBiggsAZ @RepRalphNorman We should be empowering states & local governments to increase species recovery ‚Äì not tying their hands. @replouiegohmert‚Äôs SAVES Act is a step toward enhancing diverse species populations. #ModernizeESA

@RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson @RepAndyBiggsAZ The outdated ESA currently allows the government to infringe on the private property rights of American land owners. @RepRalphNorman‚Äôs Property Rights Protection Act would #ModernizeESA by giving fair & equitable treatment to property owners.

@RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa @RepPeteOlson Under the current ESA, the U.S. is using taxpayer dollars in foreign countries, where we often can‚Äôt enforce our stringent conservation laws. @RepAndyBiggsAZ‚Äôs #HR5638 would focus our resources on protecting & revitalizing species in the U.S. #ModernizeESA

@RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus @RepLaMalfa ESA listing decisions can have huge impacts on local economies. @RepPeteOlson‚Äôs Listing Reform Act will allow for economic effects of an ESA listing to be analyzed and reported. #ModernizeESA

@RepJasonSmith @RepTipton @RepGosar @westerncaucus My friend and colleague @RepLaMalfa has been a leader in the efforts to #ModernizeESA. He understands the importance of maintaining critical infrastructure like levies and dams in rural communities while maintaining protections for ESA-listed species.

@RepJasonSmith @RepTipton .@RepGosar serves as Chairman of the @westerncaucus, leading the effort to #ModernizeESA and bring the law into the 21st Century. His bill would make important changes to the ESA to help us better achieve the intent of the law: successful species recovery.

@RepJasonSmith The ultimate goal of the ESA should be to keep species off the list. By encouraging voluntary species conservation & investment at the local level through legislation like @RepTipton‚Äôs LOCAL Act, we can improve and #ModernizeESA.
.@RepJasonSmith is working hard to #ModernizeESA by proposing the EMPOWERS Act, giving state and local governments greater power & involvement with regard to ESA petitions and listing decisions.

In order to be most effective, we must keep the ESA updated with accurate data. Rep. Gianforte's LIST Act will #ModernizeESA by requiring that species be delisted when objective, accurate scientific information finds that a species is recovered.

I introduced #HR5588 the WHOLE Act to ensure ALL conservation efforts are considered when federal decisions impacting ESA-listed species are being made. Instead of a top-down approach, we should be promoting the comprehensive efforts of states, local communities, and tribes.
The @westerncaucus legislative package will #ModernizeESA based on sound science ‚Äì not politics.

The ESA was signed into law with a worthy goal: protect & revitalize endangered or threatened animals & wildlife. Unfortunately, the outdated ESA has been manipulated as a political spearhead ‚Äì threatening private property rights, public land use, local communities, and jobs.

HAPPENING NOW: I am leading my @westerncaucus colleagues in a Special Order to discuss our efforts to strengthen & modernize the Endangered Species Act. The ESA has not been updated in 47 years & has a dismal 3% success rate. It is time to #ModernizeESA! https://t.co/GBM8AIVaqb
